displayName: Ensure the 'SYSTEM GRANT' Audit Option Is Enabled
rationale: Logging of all grant and revokes (roles and system privileges) can provide forensic evidence about a pattern of suspect/unauthorized activities. Any unauthorized attempt may be cause for further investigation.
recommended_action:
To remediate this setting, execute the following SQL statement in either the non multi-tenant or container database, it does NOT need run in the pluggable.
```
AUDIT SYSTEM GRANT;
```
ruleNames: Ensure the 'SYSTEM GRANT' Audit Option Is Enabled
